mapper.insert:
select seq_reply.nextval from dual
insert into reply (reply_no, board_no, reply, replyer, reply_date) values(#{replyNo}, #{boardNo}, #{reply}, #{replyer}, #{replyDate})
mapper.update: update reply set reply = #{reply}, replyer = #{replyer}, reply_date = #{replyDate} where reply_no = #{replyNo}
mapper.select: select count(*) from reply where board_no = #{boardNo}
select replyer "replyer", count(*) "cnt" from reply group by replyer
